# Problem 2
```{r}
sdz <- function(vec) {
  mu <- mean(vec)
  dv <- sd(vec)
  res <- (vec-mu)/dv
  return(res)
}
df2 <- x %>% select(state,stateabv,sessid,expend,salary_real,t_slength,slength) %>%
  filter(sessid=="2009/10") %>%
  drop_na(expend,salary_real,t_slength,slength) %>%
  mutate(expend <- sdz(expend),
         salary_real <- sdz(salary_real),
         t_slength <- sdz(t_slength),
         slength <- sdz(slength))
states <- df2 %>% pull(state) %>% as.character()
```
